English: Player becomes a naughty child, always being nosy wherever he goes and to anyone he meets. Due to this, he was often advised by his parents and his parents often received reports from neighbors about his misbehavior. This also has an impact on the number of friends who want to play with him.
Indonesian: Pemain menjadi seorang anak yang nakal, selalu bersikap usil kemanapun dia pergi dan kepada siapapun yang dia temui. Dikarenakan hal ini, dia sering dinasihati oleh orang tuanya dan orang tuanya sering mendapatkan laporan dari tetangga tentang kelakuan nakalnya. Hal ini pun berdampak pada sedikitnya teman yang ingin bermain bersamanya.

English: Player becomes an ordinary child, does not cause much trouble and his friends often play with him. His family also treated him normally.
Indonesian: Pemain menjadi seorang anak biasa, tidak menimbulkan banyak masalah dan temannya sering bermain dengannya. Keluarganya pun bersikap biasa saja terhadapnya.

English: Player becomes a good boy and is liked by his family and friends. Wherever he goes there is someone who greets him and everyone loves him.
Indonesian: Pemain menjadi seorang anak yang baik dan disenangi oleh keluarga dan teman-temannya. Kemanapun dia pergi pasti ada seseorang yang menyapanya dan semua orang menyukainya.

English: Player often get reprimanded either from neighbors or school and tend to be aloof. Due to this, the player does not have many friends and is famous for his mischief.
Indonesian: Pemain sering mendapat teguran baik dari tetangga atau sekolah dan cenderung penyendiri. Oleh karena hal ini, pemain tidak memiliki banyak teman dan terkenal karena kenakalannya.

English: Player don't really have many friends, but are still accepted in the community. Sometimes it creates problems but does not do anything that harms family or friends.
Indonesian: Pemain tidak terlalu memiliki banyak teman, namun masih diterima di tengah lingkungan masyarakat. Terkadang membuat masalah namun tidak sampai berbuat sesuatu yang merugikan keluarga maupun temannya.

English: The player becomes the family's favorite child and highly respected in the community. Everyone knows the player as a teenager who is kind and loves to help others.
Indonesian: Pemain menjadi anak kesayangan keluarga dan sangat disegani di tengah tengah lingkungan masyarakat. Semua orang mengenal pemain sebagai seorang remaja yang baik hati dan suka menolong sesama.
